conversation.text: For a film with an intriguing historical context, I would recommend 'Man on Wire'. This documentary follows the life of Philippe Petit, a tightrope walker who performed a daring high-wire routine between New York City's World Trade Center twin towers in 1974. The film offers a fascinating glimpse into the artistic world and the psychological aspect of such an achievement.
